p1:documents.operator:
This operator generates configuration to convert an existing kafka topic into a new k-streams topic, Enables user to define which fields correspond to longitude,latitude,identifier and timestamp. This information will be later be used during fusion execution to efficiently match records of different modalities based on spatial indices, temporal windows and identities provided.
First paragraph. Second paragraph.
Configuration part in the form of a json file.
description of the parameters and the corresponding values
The topic name. Topic must exist in kafka cluster connected (Text).
The name of the field that contains LONGITUDE information (expects Text).
The name of the field that contains LATITUDE information (expects Text).
The name of the field that contains IDENTIFIER (expects Text).
The name of the field that contains TIME information (expects Text).
The h3 resolution that contributes the spatial part of the record key. The H3 resolution controls the default spatial resolution for stream (expects integer 1-15).
Number of milliseconds that the value is available in the stream (expects Integer).
Boolean value that exposes stream values into the log.
